description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) New external doors at a scale of 1:10, including a section; c) New balustrade to rear lightwell at a scale of 1:20, including section; d) Security bars to front window at lower ground floor level at a scale of 1:20, including materials/finish; f) New internal doors and architectural joinery at a scale of 1:10, including section; g) Internal air conditioning joinery units and associated grilles at a scale of 1:20, including materials/finish; h) Any new applied hard flooring, including location, sample and section showing retention of surviving historic floorboards and relationship to retained skirtings; i) New cladding to existing lower ground floor staircase; j) New fireplaces at a scale of 1:20, including materials/finishes; l) Extent and form of upgrading works to retained internal doors for fire safety purposes; n) New built in joinery to kitchen indicating both height and relationship to adjacent historic architectural joinery; o) Detailed drawings, including, plans, elevations and sections of all alterations to garden wall in association with the extension of the lightwell, including details of any works to the footings; (Construction of a rear infill glazed extension, re-construction and extension of closet wing, internal alterations and refurbishment, roof alterations including rooflights, replacement windows in closet wing and third floor, external air conditioning unit and enclosure, associated landscaping works).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
